verses.verse: Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> to all Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3967><s%> "I am one hundred twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> this day; <S%H3117><s%> I can <S%H3201><s%> no more go out <S%H3318><s%> and come in: <S%H935><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H5674><s%> 'You shall not go over this Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>'

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> he will go over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H8045><s%> he will destroy these nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H3423><s%> and you shall dispossess them. <S%H3091><s%> Joshua shall go over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> to them as he did <S%H6213><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and to Og, <S%H5747><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and to their land; <S%H776><s%> whom he destroyed. <S%H8045><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will deliver them up <S%H5414><s%> before you, <S%H6440><s%> and you shall do <S%H6213><s%> to them according to all the commandment <S%H4687><s%> which I have commanded you. <S%H6680><s%>

Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous, <S%H553><s%> don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid, nor be scared <S%H6206><s%> of them: <S%H6440><s%> for Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> he it is who does go <S%H1980><s%> with you; <S%H7503><s%> he will not fail you, <S%H5800><s%> nor forsake you."

Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous: <S%H553><s%> for you shall go <S%H935><s%> with this people <S%H5971><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has sworn <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them; <S%H5157><s%> and you shall cause them to inherit it.

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> he it is who does go <S%H1980><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; <S%H7503><s%> he will be with you, he will not fail you, <S%H5800><s%> neither forsake you: <S%H3372><s%> don't be afraid, neither be dismayed. <S%H2865><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> this law, <S%H8451><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> it to the priests <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and to all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> saying, "At the end <S%H7093><s%> of every seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> in the set <S%H4150><s%> time of the year <S%H8141><s%> of release, <S%H8059><s%> in the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tents, <S%H5521><s%>

when all Israel <S%H3478><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> to appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which he shall choose, <S%H977><s%> you shall read <S%H7121><s%> this law <S%H8451><s%> before all Israel <S%H3478><s%> in their hearing. <S%H241><s%>

Assemble <S%H6950><s%> the <S%H6950><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> and the women <S%H802><s%> and the little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and your foreigner <S%H1616><s%> who is within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> that they may hear, <S%H8085><s%> and that they may learn, <S%H3925><s%> and fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law; <S%H8451><s%>

and that their children, <S%H1121><s%> who have not known, <S%H3045><s%> may hear, <S%H8085><s%> and learn <S%H3925><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> as long as <S%H3117><s%> you live <S%H2416><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%> where you go over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Behold, <S%H3117><s%> your days approach <S%H7126><s%> that you must die: <S%H4191><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and present <S%H3320><s%> yourselves in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> that I may commission <S%H6680><s%> him. <S%H4872><s%>" Moses and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> went, <S%H3212><s%> and presented <S%H3320><s%> themselves in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> in a pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud: <S%H6051><s%> and the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> over the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent. <S%H168><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Behold, <S%H7901><s%> you shall sleep with your fathers; <S%H1><s%> and this people <S%H5971><s%> will rise up, <S%H6965><s%> and play the prostitute <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the strange <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> where they go <S%H935><s%> to be among <S%H7130><s%> them, <S%H5800><s%> and will forsake me, <S%H6565><s%> and break my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which I have made with them. <S%H3772><s%>

Then my anger <S%H639><s%> shall be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against them in that day, <S%H3117><s%> and I will forsake <S%H5800><s%> them, <S%H5641><s%> and I will hide my face <S%H6440><s%> from them, <S%H398><s%> and they shall be devoured, and many <S%H7227><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> and troubles <S%H6869><s%> shall come on <S%H4672><s%> them; <S%H559><s%> so that they will say in that day, <S%H3117><s%> <S%H7451><s%> 'Haven't these evils come <S%H4672><s%> on us because our God <S%H430><s%> is not among us? <S%H7130><s%>'

I will surely <S%H5641><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%> for all the evil <S%H7451><s%> which they shall have worked, <S%H6213><s%> in that <S%H3588><s%> they are turned <S%H6437><s%> to other <S%H312><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>

"Now therefore write <S%H3789><s%> this song <S%H7892><s%> for yourselves, <S%H3925><s%> and teach it to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> it in their mouths, <S%H6310><s%> that this song <S%H7892><s%> may be a witness <S%H5707><s%> for me against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For when I shall have brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H127><s%> which I swore <S%H7650><s%> to their fathers, <S%H1><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> and they shall have eaten <S%H398><s%> and filled <S%H7646><s%> themselves, <S%H1878><s%> and grown fat; then will they turn <S%H6437><s%> to other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> them, <S%H5006><s%> and despise me, <S%H6565><s%> and break my covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

It shall happen, <S%H7227><s%> when many evils <S%H7451><s%> and troubles <S%H6869><s%> have come on <S%H4672><s%> them, <S%H7892><s%> that this song shall testify <S%H6030><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them as a witness; <S%H5707><s%> for it shall not be forgotten <S%H7911><s%> out of the mouths <S%H6310><s%> of their seed: <S%H2233><s%> for I know <S%H3045><s%> their imagination <S%H3336><s%> which they frame <S%H6213><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> before I have brought <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> which I swore. <S%H7650><s%>"
So Moses <S%H4872><s%> wrote <S%H3789><s%> this song <S%H7892><s%> the same day, <S%H3117><s%> and taught <S%H3925><s%> it the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He commissioned <S%H6680><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Be strong <S%H2388><s%> and courageous; <S%H553><s%> for you shall bring <S%H935><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which I swore to them: <S%H7650><s%> and I will be with you."

It happened, <S%H4872><s%> when Moses had made an end <S%H3615><s%> of writing <S%H3789><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law <S%H8451><s%> in a book, <S%H5612><s%> until they were finished, <S%H8552><s%>
that Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> who bore <S%H5375><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H3947><s%> this book <S%H5612><s%> of the law, <S%H8451><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> it by the side <S%H6654><s%> of the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> that it may be there for a witness against you. <S%H5707><s%>

For I know <S%H3045><s%> your rebellion, <S%H4805><s%> and your stiff <S%H7186><s%> neck: <S%H6203><s%> behold, <S%H2416><s%> while I am yet alive with you this day, <S%H3117><s%> you have been rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and how much more after <S%H310><s%> my death? <S%H4194><s%>

Assemble <S%H6950><s%> to me all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and your officers, <S%H7860><s%> that I may speak <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> in their ears, <S%H241><s%> and call <S%H5749><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth <S%H776><s%> to witness against them. <S%H5749><s%>

For I know <S%H3045><s%> that after <S%H310><s%> my death <S%H4194><s%> you will utterly <S%H7843><s%> corrupt <S%H7843><s%> yourselves, <S%H5493><s%> and turn aside from the way <S%H1870><s%> which I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> you; <S%H7451><s%> and evil will happen <S%H7122><s%> to you in the latter <S%H319><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> because you will do <S%H6213><s%> that which is evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> to provoke him to anger <S%H3707><s%> through the work <S%H4639><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of all the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this song, <S%H7892><s%> until they were finished. <S%H8552><s%>
